attributes.action: Immediately suspend, pending police investigation, all MP members who perverted the course of justice by overruling the Commissioner Of Standards
attributes.additional_details: The committee members who exonerated Maria Miller misused their office to pervert the course of justice in covering up the theft of taxpayer pounds by her overclaiming in the MPs expenses scheme.  Each member of that committee is complicit in a conspiracy to cover up this crime and in doing so demonstrated that they are more loyal to the Prime Minister than the people, do not demonstrate the minimum level of honesty and integrity expected in our elected representatives and must all be fully investigated in this matter by the proper forces of law and order
